Rep.ReportSql: select s.Id, s.SkuCode, i.ItemName, (select BrandName from brand where BrandId = i.BrandId) as BrandName, (select WhsName from warehouse where WhsId = s.WhsId) as WmsName, (select count(0) from stock_batchlocation where SkuCode = s.SkuCode) as InCount, s.Quantity, s.OnLock, (select Sum(Quantity) from stock_stockkjtoutrecord where ItemCode = i.ItemCode) as OutQuantity, s.Available, s.MinStock, u.ItemId from stock s join sku u on u.SkuCode = s.SkuCode join item i on i.ItemId = u.ItemId where @Param1
Rep.TotalSql: select count(0) from stock s join sku u on u.SkuCode = s.SkuCode join item i on i.ItemId = u.ItemId where @Param1
